ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of October, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
May a trial court that has received a timely but unclear Statement of Errors Complained of on Appeal request a second, clearer Statement?
